alert.note: Alert for Dawson (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 6:18AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Dawson County through 700 AM CDT... At 617 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Gothenburg, or 23 miles northwest of Lexington, moving southeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Cozad and Willow Island around 625 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Lexington and Overton. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 209 and 254. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
